price: Ambaye amekufanyieni ardhi kama tandiko, na akakufanyieni ndani yake njia mpate kuongoka.
arabic: ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ مَهۡدٗا وَجَعَلَ لَكُمۡ فِيهَا سُبُلٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تَهۡتَدُونَ
footnotes: Ambaye amekufanyieni ardhi ni pahala palipo tanda, ili muweze kukaa humo na mjitumilie, na akakufanyieni ndani yake njia mnazo zipitia katika safari zenu mpate kufikia mtakako.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: alladhī jaʿala lakumu al-arḍa mahdan wajaʿala lakum fīhā subulan laʿallakum tahtadūna
